HTTP METHOD               PATH

 GET                      /cars
 GET                      /cars/id ( get car by id)
 POST                     /cars     // adding one car
 PUT/PATCH                /cars/id
 DELETE                   /cars/id


 let cars = [
 {  id:1, name: "brom brom" },
 {  id:2, name: " Mazda" }
 {  id:2, model:"Mitsubishi" }
 ];

 // how to handle ids? The client doesn't decide. The server does. Means auto-generated id.
